collections.name: MutantMonsters
collections.description: 1000s of unique Mutant Monsters. Build a team and see them multiplying secretly by cloning themselves. One day they will take over - make sure you got the best team of Mutants!

collections.name: VSMR
collections.description: Verisafe Masternode Reservation. Reserve your Masternode on the future Verisafe coin with privacy features.

collections.name: Gods Unchained
collections.description: Gods Unchained is a free-to-play, turn-based competitive trading card game.

collections.name: CryptoKitties
collections.description: CryptoKitties is a state of the art blockchain-based game, enabling users to trade and sell their cards freely, with the same level of ownership as if they were real, tangible cards.

collections.name: The LIT Collective
collections.description: The LIT Collective is a store filled with work from various artists and backed by the ERC20 token LITonium.
